description:
Sanji takes a beating when his opponent suddenly turns invisible, Luffy finally manages to land a blow in his battle with Gecko Moria, and Usopp uses fire to ward off a zombie bear!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Clear-Clear History? Sanji`s Stolen Dream
Le lien de l`invisibilité ? Le rêve volé de Sanji !
Suke Suke no Innen? Ubawareta Sanji no Yume
Связь с фруктом Сукэ-Сукэ. Отнятая мечта Санджи
تاريخ فاكهة الشّفافية؟ حُلم سانجي المسروق
スケスケの因縁? 奪われたサンジの夢
